creator: TorahAnytime.com
descriptionHtml:
The wait is finally over! A beautiful new design and loads of new features make the new TAT 3.0 App a must to download! Many more new features are to be rolled out in the coming weeks and months.


Instant access to top-quality video and audio Torah classes by the world's greatest Torah scholars. This well-designed, powerful app was created to provide you with the most convenient, easily accessible, and fun learning experience.


New 3.0 features include: Series, Playlists, History, Advanced Search, Car Mode, Playback Speed, Trending and so much more.


Topics include: Personal Growth, Kabbalah / Jewish Mysticism, Mashiach, Philosophy and Thought, Dating and Marriage, Parenting / Raising children, Israel, Life After Death, The Weekly Torah Portion, Holidays, Life Cycle, and much more.


Speakers include: R. Zecharia Wallerstein, R. Fischel Schachter, Mr. Charlie Harary, R. Paysach Krohn. R. David Orlofsky, Reb. Yemima Mizrachi, R. Yossi Mizrachi, R. Akiva Tatz, R. Benzion Klatzko, R. Bentzion Shafier, R Jonathan Rietti, R. Mordechai Becher, R. Daniel Glatstein, R. Avrum Mordche Malach and many more.


Organizations include: Ohr Naava, Chazaq, Chazak, Emet, Keiravtuni, Aish, Gateways, Divine Information, Shabbat.com, The Shmuz, Hidabroot, Orah, RAJE, and many more.


» 700+ new classes added weekly.

» Watch Live Events right from your phone.

» Download to access classes without wi-fi or phone connection.

» Follow a Speaker, Organization, Topic or Series to be instantly notified when a new class is added.


Actual User Feedback

*****

"I have been out of school now for two years, and although I never thought I would say this, I miss it. I miss the daily inspiration, I miss the constant chizuk and I miss the constructive Musser. Ever since I've started listening to shiurim on Torah anytime, I have felt tremendous gratitude towards you."

*****

"I recently went through a challenging time and a friend recommended your site to me. The difference it has made in my life is immeasurable. I am writing from Melbourne Australia, and having access to such speakers is phenomenal. Thank you for making it possible."

*****

"I just wanted to thank you for this AMAZING organization.

I recently came back from seminary and it was so hard to adjust to work and college life. I was missing "inspirations" so much. My friend recommended me to try torahanytime speeches and I can't even tell you how I was so impressed. I listen to shiurim all the time (whenever is possible). you have such a nice variety of different topics and speakers, I never have enough! these shuirim really change me....thank you! So there's a tremendous amount of Hakras Hatov I have to you that no words would be enough to express it. I'm sure that this is what will bring our geulah b'mhera.

Keep it going!

Thank you!"


Now you can learn Torah Anytime, Anywhere.

See how we spread 10+ million hours of Torah learning every year.

creator: TorahAnytime.com
descriptionHtml:
With over 130,000 combined downloads on both mobile platforms, the TorahAnytime App is one of the most widely used Torah learning Apps in the World. Use our beautifully designed app which contains loads of desirable features. This TAT 3.0 App is a must to download! Many more new features are to be rolled out in the coming weeks and months.


Instant access to top-quality video and audio Torah classes by the world's greatest Torah scholars. This well-designed, powerful app was created to provide you with the most convenient, easily accessible, and fun learning experience.


The TAT 3.0 App features include: Series, Playlists, History, Advanced Search, Car Mode, Playback Speed, Trending and so much more.


Topics include: Personal Growth, Kabbalah / Jewish Mysticism, Mashiach, Philosophy and Thought, Dating and Marriage, Parenting / Raising children, Israel, Life After Death, The Weekly Torah Portion, Holidays, Life Cycle, and much more.


Speakers include: R. Zecharia Wallerstein z”tl, R. Fischel Schachter, Mr. Charlie Harary, R. Paysach Krohn. R. David Orlofsky, Reb. Yemima Mizrachi, R. Yossi Mizrachi, R. Akiva Tatz, R. Benzion Klatzko, R. Bentzion Shafier, R Jonathan Rietti, R. Mordechai Becher, R. Daniel Glatstein, R. Avrum Mordche Malach and many more.


Organizations include: Ohr Naava, Chazaq, Chazak, Emet, Keiravtuni, Aish, Gateways, Divine Information, Shabbat.com, The Shmuz, Hidabroot, Orah, RAJE, and many more.


» 1000+ new classes added weekly.

» Watch Live Events right from your phone.

» Download to access classes without wi-fi or phone connection.

» Follow a Speaker, Organization, Topic or Series to be instantly notified when a new class is added.


Actual User Feedback

*****

"I have been out of school now for two years, and although I never thought I would say this, I miss it. I miss the daily inspiration, I miss the constant chizuk and I miss the constructive Musser. Ever since I've started listening to shiurim on Torah anytime, I have felt tremendous gratitude towards you."

*****

"I recently went through a challenging time and a friend recommended your site to me. The difference it has made in my life is immeasurable. I am writing from Melbourne Australia, and having access to such speakers is phenomenal. Thank you for making it possible."

*****

"I just wanted to thank you for this AMAZING organization.

I recently came back from seminary and it was so hard to adjust to work and college life. I was missing "inspirations" so much. My friend recommended me to try torahanytime speeches and I can't even tell you how I was so impressed. I listen to shiurim all the time (whenever is possible). you have such a nice variety of different topics and speakers, I never have enough! these shuirim really change me....thank you! So there's a tremendous amount of Hakras Hatov I have to you that no words would be enough to express it. I'm sure that this is what will bring our geulah b'mhera.

Keep it going!

Thank you!"


Now you can learn Torah Anytime, Anywhere.

See how we spread 10+ million hours of Torah learning every year.

🎬 Picture-in-Picture Mode - Continue listening to Torah lectures while using other apps! Our new PIP feature lets you multitask without missing a moment of learning.
⚙️ Customizable Playback - Set your preferred default playback speed to personalize your learning experience.

🔧 Performance Improvements - Enhanced app stability and better notification handling.
